title: Wine service: a guide for professional waiters
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Wine and wine making
abstract: In the 1970s, there was a need for waiters to be educated about wine and the varieties available in Australia.
description: Produced by the Australian Wine Board, this work features the skills and knowledge required for wine waiting. A short instructional film, it aims to assist in making the right selection of wine varieties to match with food,  relying on the knowledge of the restaurant staff. Get the insider knowledge from inside the waiters' pantry: "it's important you have a sound knowledge of your foods, and more particularly of your wines".
